summary: This is my first mod! She's using an ECE preset made by Kayden87.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New] [/font][center][font=Courier New][img]http://i.imgur.com/enrdUeG.jpg[/img]
[size=6]   Summary[/size][/font]               
This is a custom follower made by me with permission by Kayden87 using his presets

This is my first mod. It started as a personal project but I felt that with the time spent, that it should be uploaded so that hopefully others could enjoy it as well. Maybe someday I can do more intricate mods. For right now I might make some more follower mods trying some different methods.


[font=Courier New][size=6]Follower info[/size][/font]

Name:Xevaria
Race:Nord
Voice:FemaleEvenToned
Weapon:Steel sword
Armor:scaled armor with a steel shield


She's located inside the Winking Skeever, Solitude.
She's marriageable and should be compatible with any follower overhaul.
            She's a warrior, preferring a sword and shield.                 
She is set as essential.

Currently she comes in either UNP, CBBE, and Dreamgirl versions.


[font=Courier New][size=6]Version fixes[/size][/font]
1.1-Initial release
        
1.1-Fixed dependencies
-Fixed Freckles   

1.2-allowed scaling with the player at .90, to a max of level 100

[font=Courier New] [size=6]Credits
[/size][/font][u]          Without these awesome modders, this mod wouldn't be possible           [/u]
